script.name: plugin.piracy.piratenetwork
script.description: Piracy: Pirate Network: Find distant Pirate stations

line.comment: * ----------------- PIRATE NETWORK by MISTER BEAR v1.40 -----------------
* LOCATES PIRATE BASES IN NEARBY SYSTEMS, FACILITATES BLACK MARKET TRADE
* You should set a global variable here to prevent user running two instances of the script
* display subtitle text: text='Decrypting hidden transponder signal...Please wait...' duration=2500 ms
* Copy all Yaki stations into array above
* Sort by Distance, then by Sector Name
* FLAG IF FACTORIES, ANARCHY PORTS OR DUKE'S HAVENS ARE PRESENT
* Sort remaining bases and count them
* 1ST LINE: Attempting to connect to the Virtual Pirate Network

line.text: add custom menu info line to array

line.comment: * DISPLAY DISCOVERY STATUS: Connected / Not Connected

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array

line.comment: * NO BASES ARE FOUND: There are no pirate stations operating in ...

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu heading to array

line.comment: * Check if ANARCHY PORT, DUKEs HAVEN or YAKI STATION
* Skip if so and draw later
* GET BASE LOCATION AND ITS DISTANCE IN JUMPS
* SET COLOUR ID BASED ON WHETHER PLAYER CAN DOCK. (GREEN or RED)
* Only give factories a return value

line.text: add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * Print obscured list items for each hidden base

line.text: add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * PASS CHOSEN STATION TO THE BLACK MARKET TRADER. AFTER IT RETURNS, REFRESH THE DIALOG
* TRIM FACTORY NAME : REMOVES 'ALPHA','BETA','GAMMA' FROM BASE NAMES
* ******************* : TODO: Filter out text based on game page-12
* ALPHA and GAMMA are five chars long, BETA is only four. fuck epsilon.

sval.val: Piracy: Pirate Network: Find distant Pirate stations
----------------- PIRATE NETWORK by MISTER BEAR v1.40 -----------------
LOCATES PIRATE BASES IN NEARBY SYSTEMS, FACILITATES BLACK MARKET TRADE
You should set a global variable here to prevent user running two instances of the script
Copy all Yaki stations into array above
Sort by Distance, then by Sector Name
FLAG IF FACTORIES, ANARCHY PORTS OR DUKE'S HAVENS ARE PRESENT
Sort remaining bases and count them
1ST LINE: Attempting to connect to the Virtual Pirate Network
DISPLAY DISCOVERY STATUS: Connected / Not Connected
NO BASES ARE FOUND: There are no pirate stations operating in ...
Check if ANARCHY PORT, DUKEs HAVEN or YAKI STATION
Skip if so and draw later
GET BASE LOCATION AND ITS DISTANCE IN JUMPS
SET COLOUR ID BASED ON WHETHER PLAYER CAN DOCK. (GREEN or RED)
Only give factories a return value
Print obscured list items for each hidden base
PASS CHOSEN STATION TO THE BLACK MARKET TRADER. AFTER IT RETURNS, REFRESH THE DIALOG
TRIM FACTORY NAME : REMOVES 'ALPHA','BETA','GAMMA' FROM BASE NAMES
******************* : TODO: Filter out text based on game page-12
ALPHA and GAMMA are five chars long, BETA is only four. fuck epsilon.
